name: personalai
description: PersonalAI - Comprehensive local AI assistant with chat, image/video generation, song writing, and 20+ automation skills

scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PERSONALAI_BACKEND_PORT:-4200}
